thread.title: Air Partner signs 10-week contract with oil company | Buying Business Travel
thread.title_full: Air Partner signs 10-week contract with oil company | Buying Business Travel

title: Air Partner signs 10-week contract with oil company | Buying Business Travel
text:
0 comments Brooke Bumgarner Fri, 2 Oct 2015 06:00 Follow @BBT_online Air Partner has signed a contract with a multi-national oil company that will transport oil workers to and from the Netherlands twice a week for 10 weeks. Air Partner, a global aviation services group, will charter flights from Aberdeen.
In addition, Air Partner has announced that the recently acquired Baines Simmons, leading aviation safety consultancy, will be offering Air Partner’s Oil & Gas clients custom safety and airworthiness examinations and assessments. The added service is a first for the company.
CEO Mark Briffa, commented that Air Partner is “very proud of the work we do in the Oil & Gas sector and this contract is another feather in our cap…We look forward to leveraging our combined expertise, resources and experience to offer Oil & Gas clients the most reliable efficient and comprehensive service possible.”
